bibl.title: Three Xenophon Papyri. One Scribe.
bibl.note: The Oec.-fragment P. Tebt. II, 682 (= Pack2 2905) has been identified by: Jean LENAERTS, Un papyrus de l'Économique de Xénophon, ChrEg 49 (1974) No. 98, pp. 354-355. Several similarities point to the scribe who has written the Smp.-papyri P. lit. Lond. 152 and P. Giss. I, 1 (= Pack2 1565).
VAN ROSSUM-STEENBEEK Monique, Three Xenophon Papyri. One Scribe.
